title: Add download summary button
goal: Enable users to download a JSON summary of meeting duration, total cost, and per-role breakdown from the client side.

context.notes: Leverage existing timer state to build the export payload; no backend support is required.

changes.summary: Add a UI control to trigger a JSON download of meeting metrics and ensure the exported structure mirrors the domain model.
acceptanceCriteria: MeetingTimerShell exposes a button to download the summary JSON
useMeetingTimer provides the data needed for the export (time, total cost, per-role costs)
Tests cover the exported payload shape and triggering logic

manualChecks: Run the app, start/stop a timer, and confirm the downloaded JSON matches on-screen values
